hero.description: We are here to provide practical, free tools that help you get things done quickly and without friction. We believe that tools that can be free should not be locked behind paywalls, and users deserve an experience without ads, sign‚Äëups or tracking.

free.title: Truly free
free.desc: All of our tools are completely free, with no limits and no annoying ads. There is no freemium model or hidden subscription.

privacy.title: Security & privacy
privacy.desc: We do not collect any of your data. All processing happens in your browser, so even if the site gets hacked, there is nothing sensitive to leak.

fast.title: Fast and simple to use
fast.desc: A clean, focused UI/UX makes it easy to understand each tool and use it without friction.

product.title: A real, useful product
product.desc: This project is more than a portfolio piece. It is built as a complete, useful product for real users.

story.title: The story behind the project
story.p1: This project started with the goal of providing practical, free tools. We wanted to build something people can rely on to get their work done without stress or wasted time.
story.p2: The project is designed and implemented from scratch, without using paid templates or copied code. Everything is custom‚Äëbuilt to create the best possible experience for you.

support.title: Support the project
support.description: Our goal is to keep all tools free, but if you like the project and want to help, you can support it voluntarily. Even the smallest contribution is a way to say thank you for an ad‚Äëfree, limitation‚Äëfree experience.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to questions you might also have

noSignup.q: Do I need an account to use the tools?
noSignup.a: No sign‚Äëup is required. We believe in a frictionless user experience. All tools run instantly in your browser without asking for email or personal details.

dataStored.q: Are my files or data stored on the server?
dataStored.a: No, this is one of our core principles. All processing (like image compression, PDF conversion, etc.) happens client‚Äëside in your browser. No files are uploaded and no data leaves your device.

sizeLimit.a: No server‚Äëside limits, because processing happens on your own device. The only real limits are your hardware (RAM and CPU). The tools are optimized to handle large files where possible.

ads.a: No, the project is completely free and ad‚Äëfree. We believe useful tools should stay clean and focused on the task, not on showing banners.

offline.q: Can I use the tools offline?
offline.a: Yes. Thanks to the PWA architecture and local processing, most tools continue to work correctly after the initial load, even without an internet connection.

original.q: Is this project copied from somewhere?
original.a: No, all tools, UI and code are the result of personal work and custom design. We do not use stolen code or premade templates; the goal is to deliver an original, high‚Äëquality product.

whyFree.a: The goal is to support the web community and provide safe tools. Free means an experience without ads, tracking or hassle. Server costs are low (no heavy server‚Äëside processing), and voluntary support from users is our most valuable asset.

hero.title: Privacy policy
hero.lead: At Tools Manager, privacy is not an optional feature; it is a core design principle. We are fully committed to being transparent about how we handle data.

principle1.title: Principle #1: Local, serverless processing
principle1.intro: Tools Manager has no backend servers for processing, storing or analyzing user files. Unlike many online services that send your data to their servers, here:

points.allInBrowser: All processing happens 100% in your browser
points.onlyCpuRam: Only your CPU and RAM are used

files.title: No files are stored
files.body: Your files (PDFs, images, text, etc.) are processed temporarily in browser memory (RAM) and cleared immediately after the operation finishes. No copies are stored, archived or transferred.

cookies.title: Cookies and local storage
cookies.noTrackingBody: We do not use cookies to track users, analyze behavior, build profiles or serve ads.
cookies.localIntro: The only data stored locally is related to the site‚Äôs appearance settings:
cookies.themeBody: To provide a better experience, your selected theme is stored in the browser so the same look is used next time. This is not personal data and is never sent to any server.

security.title: Data security
security.intro: Because there is no storage backend, the architecture is intentionally designed to push the risk of data leaks as close to zero as possible:
security.quote: "If we have no data, nothing can be leaked."

footer.changesBody: If this policy is updated, the date will change and the new version will be published on this page. Continued use of the site means you accept the latest version.
footer.contactBody: If you have any questions about privacy, you can reach our support via the contact page.
